subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
lead_paragraph: Ned Hirsch, a 54-year-old college basketball fan, has seen 222 N.C.A.A. Division I men’s teams, a run that began with a 1970 National Invitation Tournament game at Madison Square Garden.
